class.name: EuclideanDoublePoint

javadoc.text: A simple implementation of {@link Clusterable} for points with double coordinates.
javadoc.deprecated: As of 3.2 (to be removed in 4.0), * use {@link org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.DoublePoint} instead

javadoc.text:
Build an instance wrapping an integer array. *

* The wrapped array is referenced, it is not copied.
javadoc.param: point the n-dimensional point in integer space

javadoc.text: Get the n-dimensional point in integer space.
javadoc.return: a reference (not a copy!) to the wrapped array
